data.text: Na lɔxɔni, Yuda yamanan muxune bɛtin bama nɛn, e naxa,
Ɛ taan so dɛɛne rabi,
Naxanye yugon fan,
Ɛ yigi sa Alatala yi habadan,
Muxun naxanye dɔxi yire matexini,
Sɛnbɛtarene a yibodonma nɛn,
Tinxin muxuna kiraan tinxin nɛn.
Alatala, nxu xaxili tixi i tan nan na
I xɔnla n niin yɛtɛɛn suxuma kɔɛɛn na,
Xa i hinan muxu ɲaxine ra,
Alatala, i yiini texi e xili ma,
Alatala i bɔɲɛ xunbenla fima nxu ma,
Alatala, nxɔ Ala,
Ne bata faxa,
Alatala, i bata nxɔ bɔxɔn fari sa,
Alatala, muxune e yɛɛ rafindima i tan nan ma tɔrɔni.
Alatala, nxu lu nɛn i yɛtagi,
Nxu fan na sɔxɔlɛn sifan sɔtɔxi nɛn,
Ɛ faxa muxune niin birama e yi nɛn,
N ma yamana, ɛ so ɛ konni,
Amasɔtɔ Alatala nan minima a dɔxɔdeni
